meanings.definition: Covered with a sticky or unpleasant substance.
meanings.sent1: The icky candy bar got stuck to my fingers.
meanings.sent2: The garbage can had an icky smell coming from it.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally touched the icky gum under the desk.
meanings.sent4: The icky mud clung to my shoes like glue.
meanings.sent5: The icky slime oozed out of the container, making a mess.

meanings.sent1: The icky taste of the medicine made me cringe.
meanings.sent2: The movie had an icky ending that left me feeling unsatisfied.
meanings.sent3: She made an icky face when she tried the strange food.
meanings.sent4: The icky situation made everyone uncomfortable.
meanings.sent5: The icky sound of nails on a chalkboard made me shiver.
